alert.note: Alert for Taliaferro; Warren; Wilkes (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 7:27PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Warren, east central Taliaferro and Wilkes Counties through 800 PM EDT... At 727 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Metasville, or near Washington, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Washington, Tignall, Rayle, Jacksons Crossroads, Cadley, Mallorysville, Delhi, Lundberg, Norman, Metasville, Floral Hill, Holliday Park, Aonia, Newtown, Danburg, Rocky Creek Fire Dept., Celeste, and Mesena. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
